Articles.Content:
The Grasshopper tester from KerbX (er....SpaceX). It is used to test the Falcon 9 recoverable first stage, and here is it in KSP.

It has a very high chance of blowing up the pad, as I discovered, so beware.

Here is a pic of it after landing.

Instructions: None really, it has 3 parachutes as well as rockets. Have fun!

Download: http://www./download/9mder33wmeuixl8/SpaceX+Grasshopper.craft
